articles.title: Propositions from Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Introduced in U.S.
articles.content:
Propositions from Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Introduced in U.S. 
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Ten propositions from leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" were introduced by the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics to several anti-imperialist organizations and posted by it on Internet Joint Homepages on July 3

DPRK Friendship Order and Medal Awarded to Russian Figures
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Order and Medal Awarded to Russian Figures 
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Friendship order and medal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea were awarded to Russian figures with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on August 11.
 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned, Councilor Mikhail Vetrov and officials of the Russian embassy here and a Russian musician and his party.    
 After a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was read out, DPRK Friendship Order Second Class was awarded to Stanislav Kalinin, dean of the Conduct Faculty of Moscow State Conservatory named after Tchaikovsky, and a DPRK Friendship Medal to Zoya Abolits, teacher of the Piano Faculty of the conservatory, in recognition of their devoted efforts made for musical exchange conducive to the development of friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia while supporting the Korean people in their efforts for socialist construction.

articles.title: Film Show at Ministry of Foreign Trade
articles.content:
Film Show at Ministry of Foreign Trade 
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Trade arranged a film show at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on August 11 on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the liberation of the country.
 Present on invitation were members of the foreign economic and commercial counselors' corps here. And officials concerned were together with them.    
 The participants appreciated Part 20 of the Korean documentary film "For the Liberation of the Motherland" recording historical data on the fact that President Kim Il Sung accomplished the historic cause of the country's liberation by triumphantly commanding the final offensive operation to wipe out the Japanese imperialist aggressors and wisely led the work for building a new country.

Kim Jong Il and Kim Yong Nam Greet Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Kim Yong Nam Greet Fidel Castro Ruz
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, and Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on August 11 on his 78th birthday.
 The message wished him good health and happiness as well as greater success in his responsible work for defending the gains of the revolution and continuously advancing the socialist cause triumphantly.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the liberation of the country.
 It was conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Palestinian Ambassador Shaher Mohammed Abdlah to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Korean Ambassador to Nepal Appointed
articles.content:
Korean Ambassador to Nepal Appointed
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Hwang Yong Hwan was appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to the Kingdom of Nepal, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam Meets Chinese Party Delegation
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Party Delegation
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of party officials of the Communist Party of China.
 It was handed by Wang Weihua, deputy director of the Party History Research Centre of the Central Committee of the CPC, who is heading the delegation to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on August 12.
